overview: Why are we fired... Until now, you've used us so badly... It's a shame when it's no longer needed. Ah, it's nice to have a rich husband Sannomiya... even if you don't have a job, your husband will make money for you. I'm annoyed, so it's okay to let me fuck you one last time... Oh, I just thought of a good idea... (laughs).
title: Skewered Wheel Employee Trip Tsubaki Sannomiya
